transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Ji good afternoon sir.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Kar liya sir aapne IndiaMART ka application download?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Sir IndiaMART ka application download kar liya?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan.
Customer: Kiya maine kuch? Haan.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Login kar liya tha usme?
Customer: Login kar liya tha. Maine abhi toh nikal aaya main actually. Haan. 3:00 baje ke aas paas maine kiya tha call 2:00 baje. Toh I was waiting for your call. Maine toh unka aapka lunch khatam hi nahi hua hoga. Main 3:15 ke baad nikla hu yaha se.
Executive: Achcha. But I have utilised some buyleads. Dekh liya. Kuch jo hai not relevant thi woh nikal di maine. Haan.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Aapne abhi buyleads kuch consume ki sir?
Customer: Haan kuch consume.
Executive: Achcha aaj aaj mein kar li matlab aapne?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Thik hai. Bas koi baat nahi sir consume toh aap khud kar hi loge. But just main isliye keh rahi thi ki main aapko thoda important buyleads kaise aap consume kar sakte ho na bas wohi batana tha mujhe.
Customer: Haan. Dekh toh main actually phir se kabhi ek baar main baith gaya toh main aapko phone call karta hu. Working time mein.
Executive: Haan bilkul bilkul hai na. Kabhi bhi aap free ho toh aap mujhe call kar lena ispe bilkul.
Customer: Haan haan. Okay. Toh discuss kar lenge hai na.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive inquired if customer downloaded IndiaMART application.

Resolution:

- Executive offered guidance on consuming important buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back when free.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- indiamart application, buyleads, consume
